Name: SJ-19 Learns To Love!
About the game: SJ-19 Learns to Love is a short boss focused metroidvania about a KILLER ROBOT who learns to love. Fight and explore a mysterious planet while gaining ~EMOTIONAL MATURITY~ 100+ rooms to EXTERMINATE.
